title: Question for Riot (Champion Mastery)
body:
So we have been told that Champion Mastery is based off your own personal performance and that the Grade is a determining factor for how many CP we get for that Match.

Now i was in a premade of 5, we were all getting seperate grades for the games, however we noticed that we all earned the same CP, how is this possible if the Grades actually make a difference at all?

I realize you can't release any metrics, but i feel this is somewhat breaking of the system that realistically you can get a D and your team can actually pull your CP earnings upwards.

replies.body:
Well, the main indicator of performance is wether or not you managed to win.
Plus there's a bonus for premade teams and a time component, i noticed.
